entries.title: Xbox accused of being 'woke' for a deeply stupid reason
entries.description: A new front has opened in the culture wars, and it may be the dumbest one yet: console power management.

entries.title: The Elder Scrolls Online is returning to Vvardenfall in Shadow Over Morrowind
entries.description: The next big TESO adventure begins in March.

entries.title: Forza Motorsport promises ray traced reflections, 'fully procedural' clouds, and loads of other technical doodads
entries.description: The upcoming racing game boasts spectrophotometer-sourced car paints with simulated thickness.

entries.title: Redfall gets May release date and new deep dive video
entries.description: Arkane showed off a new 11 minutes of co-op and questing in its vampire FPS.

entries.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley is getting multiplayer this year
entries.description: The roadmap for 2023 reveals several new incoming characters and my biggest feature request.

entries.title: Evil Within studio announces rhythm action game Hi-Fi Rush, and it's out now
entries.description: Tango Gameworks is throwing everyone a curve with a cartoony action rhythm game that you can play right now.

entries.title: Minecraft Legends PvP will 'embrace chaos and fun,' says Mojang
entries.description: Mojang showed off its first Minecraft PvP mode and announced an April release date for Legends.

entries.title: Microsoft says to expect 'PC market weakness' for the foreseeable future
entries.description: Windows revenue ain't doin' so hot, and it doesn't look like that'll be changing anytime soon.

entries.title: How to complete the Resisting the Storm quest in WoW: Dragonflight
entries.description: Some players are having trouble with the objective.

entries.title: Activision Blizzard studio drops its union vote, claiming 'free and fair election impossible'
entries.description: Proletariat began its push in December, but the process has worn workers thin.

entries.title: Google's The Last of Us Easter egg is parasitic fungus
entries.description: Why not infect your browser with something benign for once.

entries.title: Forspoken's PC port is another fine Square Enix mess
entries.description: Maintaining those PC quality standards.

entries.title: Roller Drama review
entries.description: A narrative game with a few bruises.

entries.title: Obsidian once had plans for a Rick & Morty game
entries.description: Apathy is death, Rick.

entries.title: Inkulinati turns farting animals into a cunning little strategy game
entries.description: Rabbits, dogs and donkeys take to the turn-based battlefield.

entries.title: Machine translation startup predicts humanity's impending obsolescence
entries.description: The rate at which machine translation improves is used to predict when the technological singularity will happen.

entries.title: How to find and unlock the Revival Catalyst in WoW: Dragonflight

entries.title: How and when to watch the Xbox and Bethesda livestream today
entries.description: For the first showcase of the year, Xbox and Bethesda are bringing out new details on four different games.

entries.title: MIT grows 2D crystals on existing silicon to make new semiconductors and catch up to Moore's law
entries.description: Moore's law might not be dead, just in need of a rewrite.

entries.title: Almost 35,000 PayPal accounts breached using known credentials
entries.description: Login and password combinations from other sites were used for the breach.

entries.title: New Fallout TV series set photos show iconic Red Rocket gas station
entries.description: The rocket itself hasn't been built yet, and the Red Rocket sign is still wrapped in plastic... but you can still see it.

entries.title: Drake and Lil Yachty do a Steam Deck handoff between moving SUVs
entries.description: Don't try this at home, unless you are very wealthy.

entries.title: Everyone agrees this Genshin Impact character should never rap again
entries.description: Hu Tao's rap has Genshin Impact fans plugging their ears.
